mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM FAQ

SELECT RNUM, FAQ_NUM, QCATEGORY_NUM, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT FAQ_NUM, QCATEGORY_NUM, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER FROM VIEW_FAQLIST ORDER BY FAQ_NUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT RNUM, FAQ_NUM, QCATEGORY_NUM, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT FAQ_NUM, QCATEGORY_NUM, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER FROM VIEW_FAQLIST WHERE QCATEGORY_NUM = #{qcategory_num} ORDER BY FAQ_NUM DESC) DATA) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_NUM, QCATEGORY_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER) VALUES(FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qcategory_num}, #{admin_num}, #{faq_question}, #{faq_answer})
